name: secret-santa
description: React based Secret Santa generator. Built on top of my gift-exchange library, this is a web app that helps you create a Secret Santa or any other matching of people together. It supports grouping of people as well as group and individual exclusions to all of your custom rules.

name: gift-exchange
description: A library to generate unbiased pairs of names for a gift exchange or secret santa.

name: BrianMitchL.github.io
description: This very site. My portfolio website and blog, built with Eleventy.

name: PR Chatter Action
description: GitHub Action for intelligent GIF replies for Pull Request approvals and when changes are requested.

name: LastFM Proxy
description: A Cloudflare Worker acting as a proxy for the LastFM API in order to expose endpoints.

name: weatherBot
description: A Python based twitter bot for tweeting scheduled updates, forecasts, and special weather events.

name: The Nexus CMS Admin Frontend
description: Vue.js frontend for "the new CMS" of The Nexus podcast network.

name: Hey, Get Back to Work!
description: A simple website to remind you to get back to work. Send the link to a distracted friend, co-worker, or family member!

name: BPM
description: An iOS application written in Swift to count the beats per minute (BPM) in a song. This was started at the CarlHacks 2016 hackathon.

name: YeoMEAN
description: Former main website. The name is a pun on the Yeoman generator and the MEAN stack. Initially started as a MEAN stack tutorial project for a course at UMM, but then morphed into a full fledged homepage.
